name: Scott's Landscaping, Inc
description: Scott's Landscaping, Inc. is a website built with MongoDB, Express.js, React.js and Node. Enhanced user experience and user interface (UX/UI) design decisions, resulting in 30% increase in website engagement and 20% decrease in bounce rate. Developed responsive web applications, improving website accessibility across devices and increased user retention rate by 15%. Successfully managed the transfer of domain registrar, email provider transfer, and updated DNS records.

name: Money Mania
description: Money Mania is an application designed for high school students to learn about finance. For the GA 2023 Hackathon and placing runner up. Worked on a team of 3 UX/UI designers and 4 software developers. Responsible for the back-end server and also developed 3 pages for the frontend.

name: Millie's Messenger
description: Millie's Messenger is a live messaging app that can be used as a template for incorporating Socket.IO, MongoDB Change Streams, Express, React.js, Node.js and JSON Web Tokens/ Bearer Authorization.

name: HAPI Hour
description: An app built with React.js to help users find drink recipes from thecocktaildb API. User can search by name/ phrase, search by ingredient, choose a random drink, or start with a base ingredient choice and browse.
